attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cut tax on car fuel. It's far too high, and crippling our way of life. Without alternative transport options of big city dwellers we, particularly in rural counties, have to pay bigger percentage from our smaller incomes than those in London and other city dwellers.
